description: The elevator in building A has been making strange noises and occasionally stopping between floors. This has happened three times this week and is concerning for safety reasons.
Loud music and parties from apartment B-301 almost every night after 11 PM. It's affecting my sleep and work schedule. This has been ongoing for two weeks.
Main gate security camera appears to be not working. The screen shows static and there's no recording for the past few days. This is a security concern for all residents.
Low water pressure in apartment A-401, especially in the kitchen and main bathroom. Sometimes there's no water at all during peak hours in the morning.
Non-residents are parking in our designated visitor spots for extended periods. This leaves no space for actual visitors of residents. Need better monitoring.
Gym equipment needs maintenance. Treadmill #2 stops randomly, and several weight machines have loose bolts. Safety hazard for users.
Street lights in the parking area are flickering and some are completely out. This creates poor visibility and safety concerns during night hours.
Garbage collection area near building C has not been cleaned properly. Bad smell and attracting pests. Needs immediate attention and regular maintenance schedule.
Requested maintenance fee receipt for tax purposes three weeks ago but haven't received it yet. Need official documentation for financial records.
Fire extinguisher in building B, 2nd floor is expired (last serviced in 2022). Need immediate replacement and check of all other fire safety equipment in the complex.
